content: teabag by jenny church seed stitch/moss stitch row 1 and all odd row - k1 p1 k1 p1 repeat for all stitches row 2 and all even row - p1 k1 p1 k1 repeat for all stitches using 3mm needles and dk yarn making up front back and sides make 2 fold along green lines cast on 16 stitches in light brown attach pieces by sewing row 1-18 seed stitch all row together red lines change to dark brown attach second piece by sewing row 19-26 seed stitch all row together purple lines cast o cid 431 knitwise stu cid 431 bottom of bag only sew up sides of bag sewing all bottom piece sides together to gather top third of bag cast on 12 stitches in dark brown add eyes and smile row 1-6 seed stitch all row sew up top of bag cast o cid 431 knit wise tag cast on 8 stitches in teal/turquoise row 1-16 stocking stitch to make up fold in half and stitch up all sides feet cast on 8 stitches in mid brown row 1 purl row 2 k2tog x 4 row 3 p2tog x2 row 4 knit row 5 purl cast o cid 431 to make up gather cast on stitches with cast on yarn and then sew up row ends
